definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Taoist monastery/palace gate watchtower/platform
surname Guan
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
Bodhisattva
Bodhisattva/surname Sa

sentences.english: After I went to the Museum, I discovered that Guan Yin Bodhisattva has arrived in Ukiah much earlier.
sentences.chinese: 去了才知道，觀音菩薩比我們都早到了瑜伽鎮。

sentences.english: Is Guanyin Bodhisattva Here or Not?
It has the largest wooden image of the Buddhist Goddess of Mercy, Guanyin.
sentences.chinese: 在其中有最大的觀音菩薩木像。

sentences.english: Nanputuo Temple is a temple dedicated to the Goddess of Mercy.
sentences.chinese: 南普陀寺是供奉觀音菩薩的寺廟。

sentences.english: Eleven faces Avalokiteshvara is one of the often seen form of Avalokiteshvara Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 十一面觀音爲觀音菩薩的常見形象之一。

sentences.english: It's a mantra of compassion buddha.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個觀音菩薩的密咒。

sentences.english: At the same time, the Avalokitesvara of the South Sea happened to pass by, held out the both sides, and acted as mediator.
sentences.chinese: 此時恰好南海觀音菩薩經過，喝住雙方並出面調停。

sentences.english: The Guanyin Bodhisattva is fighting against the turtle.
sentences.chinese: 觀音菩薩正和鰲魚搏鬥。

definition: Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness

solemn/dignified/stately
Samantabhadra, the Buddhist Lord of Truth
